amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the rule entitled "Hazardous Materials: Enhanced Tank Car Standards and Operational Controls for High-Hazard Flammable Trains".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the rule entitled "Hazardous Materials: Enhanced Tank Car Standards and Operational Controls for High-Hazard Flammable Trains".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 286 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 286 (Roll no. 312).
